about_the_game:
The man who lost his beloved family challenges the evil underground ruins in search of a dubious miracle. To deeper of the darkness, all for what he had lost . . .


Role of Remains is a story-driven and turn-based battle RPG having tactics. We will deliver a heavy atmosphere but challenging game experience with a depressed and sorrowful world view, a battle that feels tension and a sense of accomplishment.

THIS IS A DEMO!
I'm releasing a demo to get your feedback. Let me know what you think to refine the full version!

Features:
  • A heavy atmosphere and challenging RPG experience built with an interesting story and a tense battle.
  • A text-based event scene with a cinematic direction.
  • A tactical battle system. A challenging battle where the more you play, the deeper your understanding, and the more you feel the response. To put in short, "Distract the foe's attention and hit foe off guard! And block the attack!"
  • Exploring the dungeon next to death. A planned exploration that takes into account the ever-decreasing stamina.
  • Character growth through a skill tree.
